name: LspAntlr
description: VSCode for Antlr using LSP server
author: Ken Domino

languageServerExample.maxNumberOfProblem.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

languageServerExample.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile

antlr.path.description: The path to clangd executable, e.g.: /usr/bin/clangd

antlr.syncFileEvents.description: Whether or not to send file events to clangd (File created, changed or deleted). This can be disabled for performance consideration.

antlr.trace.description: Names a file that clangd should log a performance trace to, in chrome trace-viewer JSON format.
